column4: Hi all! cantfind an answer cause maybe i dont know the question. Im looking for a way to add commands to be run at the start of Xfce.. Specifically the mounting of a win disk. I could make an icon to run but i would like it to run by itsef.
nils:yes, i found the command to run. i just need it a script to put it in.. fstab? is that a script
